nodes.text: Spitcrete was a primitive building material used to build low load-bearing items such as benches.
In contrast to durasteel or permacrete, spitcrete was not customarily utilized as a construction material in most civilized portions of the galaxy.
Jaina Solo and her Jedi companions sat on spitcrete benches while eating in the Taat valley.
Spitcrete could be used for other tasks, such as primitive heat sinks used on the Killiks Nest Ship.
